entry.title: A Blank Canvas Could Become a Paint-Stained Masterpiece
entry.summary:
Author: RiverOverHere

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,161Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 1

Summary: Jason knew that his soulmark was different from that of others. Where those around him had names tattooed on their wrists or timers ticking down until a fateful meeting occurred, Jason was stuck trying to decipher blobs and splotches covering his hands and arms, paint-like stains that infuriated him in their vagueness. This wasn’t like those who could write on their skin and have someone else write back. No. That would be too convenient for the life of someone like Jason Todd.AKAJason's side of my 'Paint-Stained Fingers' Soulmate AU

entry.title: Strawberry Waffles
entry.summary:
Author: lushescape

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,814Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 93

Summary: “Like a date?” You ask in a near whisper. Jason looks like he's been electrocuted but slowly he nods his head twice. “Yeah. A date. You and me, the school dance.” Oh. Your heart feels like it's beating so fast it's going to stop at any second. But you nod, your face warm, and there's no way you can stop yourself from smiling now. “Um, y- yeah.” You stammer before clearing your throat softly. “Yes.” You say, more confident in your answer. “Yes, I would.. love to go with you. On a date. To the dance.” Or Jason Todd becomes a girl dad after dying and coming back to life

entry.title: Burning House
entry.summary:
Author: Yes_I_have_daddy_issues

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,615Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 50

Summary: We were kids together, growing up in the same crime ridden alleyways and neighborhoods, just two doors down the road from each other. “I’ll find a way.” he turned back to face me, a big smile stretching across his face, one I would never forget, the light in his eyes visible.I never saw Jason again after that night. Not in person at least.On the news, getting adopted by Bruce Wayne of all people, waving and smiling to the cameras, it never reached his eyes the way his smile always did when we were younger.Then he vanished for good.

entry.title: Inventors Of The Past
entry.summary:
Author: TheGhostInTheRoom

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,611Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 4

Summary: You could never claim to be a lady of the higher society, and you weren't going to start now. You've been a pirate, a thief, a rude woman. You would never willingly step foot into their courts. Regardless of the fact you now found yourself intermingled with the Wayne Family. Who was the highest of Society, and were currently making you step foot into their court. The ones who indirectly ruined your life, and the ones who would unfortunately become your savior. Especially when one seems to share the same goal as you. Killing the Crown Prince of Gotham. Prince Jack Napier.

entry.title: Let Me Have One Good Thing
entry.summary:
Author: lushescape

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,570Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 22

Summary: He doesn't remember the last time he met someone like you. Someone who made his stomach twist and coil in the most uncomfortable ways, someone who made his heart pitter patter - he broke into the cave one night and insisted that Alfred hook him up to every machine at their disposal to make sure he wasn't having a heart attack. When Alfred asked what brought on the sudden heart palpitations Jason refused to tell him it was because you smiled at him and ruffled his hair like a child. Or You're the one good thing Jason's had in his life in a long time, too bad he's doomed by the narrative

entry.title: Dedicated
entry.summary:
Author: writerclaire

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,830Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 39

Summary: You haven’t been happy in years, but being a successful author meant you had a roof over your head and food that wasn’t swiped from the trash. You were content. However, your peaceful hermit days are threatened when the hate mail becomes very real death threats and you are forced to accept a bodyguard. Jason Todd doesn’t have a lot to be thankful for. Shitty dad, missing mom. Homelessness. Hunger. Then came another shitty dad. Oh, and he died once, after he was tortured by an evil clown. Now he’s back and he’s ready to give the world back what it gave to him, but he is forced to rethink his priorities when he realizes that the one good thing he ever had is in danger.

entry.title: In Sickness And In Health
entry.summary:
Author: Ava_Mae

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,273Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 96

Summary: "Jeez sweetheart, you look awful.""I feel awful," you muttered hoarsely.Jay frowned behind the domino mask. "Shit, it must be bad if you're not even gonna be snarky back to me."~ "......fine."Jay cracked a grin. "Y'know, for a nurse, you make a pretty terrible patient.""Fuck you," you muttered. "See? There we go, you must be feeling better already."
